page.title: 09T.RUSHTON VILLAGE STORES
page.content: {THE VILLAGE SHOP}IS IN SMALL COTTAGE WHICH IS ABOUT 150 YEARS OLD.THE OWNER OF THE SHOP IS{MRS.M.MORSE.}SHE HAS HAD THE SHOP FOR 35 YEARS AND HER GRANDMA HAD THE SHOP BEFORE HER.BEFORE THAT,IN HER FATHER'S TIME,THE SHOP WAS AT DORSET COTTAGE.THERE HAS BEEN A SHOP IN RUSHTON ALL THIS CENTURY. { MRS.MORSE}SELLS MOST THINGS APART FROM FROZEN FOODS AND MEAT.SHE DOES NOT SELL ICE-CREAM BUT SHE SELLS SWEETS! WE BOUGHT SOME! MOST VILLAGE PEOPLE USE THE SHOP BECAUSE IT IS CONVENIENT,BUT IT IS EXPENSIVE. THE OPENING HOURS ARE 8.30AM TO 5.30PM,BUT SHE WILL SERVE PEOPLE AT ANY TIME WITHIN REASON. PEOPLE EXPECT HER TO SELL EVERYTHING AND SHE DOES HER BEST! {KIRSTIE, CLARE,JOHN & KARL.
